author: schor
msg: [UIMA-386] prepare for allowing switching generators due to different classloaders being used.

author: bravi
msg: [YOKO-366] - Creating the corba type map at the init time & not per invocation.

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-394] remove sofa2jcasMap - was redundant with other ways of linking cas and
jcas, and wasn't being properly updated.
Also changed references to fs.hashcode() to ... .getAddress() to better document what is
being done, where the hashcode() method was being used to just get the address in the
CAS of an element (for future maintainers).

author: cutting
msg: HADOOP-1255.  Fix a bug where the namenode falls into an infinite loop trying to remove a dead node.  Contributed by Hairong.
